title: Hit the books in our favorite outdoor classrooms (The Trust for Public Land)
text: ( Source : The Trust for Public Land ) The National Park Service is marking its hundredth birthday with a special gift to kids. In a bid to get more students and families outdoors, the 'Every Kid in a Park ' initiative is providing free
